findings.title: Invalid Calculations in Events
findings.description: In the claim() function of IncentiveDistributor.sol contract, the given _tokenIds parameter is decreased in the for loop and then its last value is emitted with the Claimed event, resulting in the emitted value to be always equal to 0.

findings.title: 12. Invalid Comparison
findings.description: In the PortfolioSub.sol contract's safeDecreaseTotal() function there is a require statement that compares the amount of tokens to the fee charged for the transaction. If these are equal, the actual amount of tokens received will be 0.

findings.title: _checkClaim()
findings.description: Use the EIP-712 standard for hashing and signing of typed structured data.

findings.title: 8. Data inconsistency
findings.description: Data inconsistency can lead to unintended behavior and errors.

findings.title: Unfinalized Code
findings.description: Hardcoded version number with no other options than '1', making it redundant.

findings.title: Missing Check Validation
findings.description: The software does not check the return value of methods or functions, which can prevent it from detecting unexpected states and conditions.
